page.title: 17A BOARDING WEEKEND
page.content: On a Saturday morning I get up at seven o'clock.At eight o'clock I go down to school,I do not finish school until one o'clock.When I get back to the house I change into my rough clothes.I then have three quarters of an hour before I am allowed to go down to the village shop.After that there are either some trips to places like Cheddar Gorge,or I play cricket. On Sunday I get up at eight o'clock,I go down to school at nine o'clock for my breakfast.As soon as I have finished my breakfast I go back to the house,for public works.When that is over there may be church or free time.Lunch is at twelve thirty after lunch is letter writing.When that is over we get three or four hours free time.There is roll call at four forty five,then tea at five o'clock.
